articles.author: Elizabeth Rayne
articles.title: Gotta go? We've finally found out what makes urine yellow - Ars Technica
articles.description: The yellow color comes from bacteria metabolizing waste from red blood cells.
articles.content:
26
There are many mysteries in life that we end up shrugging off. Why is urine yellow? It just is, right? Rather than flush that 125-year-old question down the toilet, scientists sought out the answ… [+4234 chars]
